response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and I understand its worth to you is around $120. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you for $140. This price reflects both the product's worth and my desire to make a fair deal. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 140}
